Name: From the Town of Gleming
About the game: you are called to a spooky little island by your grandfather after the untimely death of your grandmother. but when you get there all is not well. A mystery unfurls itself, You will have to pick up the pieces, in the form of notes, news clipping, totems, and a couple of sexy postcards; unravel the mystery behind the eldritch happenings or madness (perhaps both?) that has plagued the island. You will have to explore a variety of unique locations: the town of Gleming, the abandoned asylum, the woods, the light house, and places beyond mortal comprehension. An ancient evil languishes hidden in Glemming, will you find what's needed to put an end to it? What comes from the town of Gleming? Key features -tantalizing postcards to find -story told in hidden written clippings -unique Victorian inspired town -secret rooms -two endings
